website_summaries.verdict: An extremely lightweight, sheer mineral sunscreen that contains soothing natural ingredients and won’t irritate children’s skin.
pros: Contains 100% non-nano zinc for broad-spectrum sun protection
Features natural skin-soothing ingredients like shea butter, sunflower seed oil, jojoba oil, and calendula flower extract
Lightweight and sheer, so it doesn’t leave a white cast on the skin
cons: Can sometimes be difficult to blend in
Even though it’s fragrance-free, some buyers say they don’t like the scent

customer_reviews.title: Safe for baby!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing my research, so happy to have found a safe sunscreen for my baby that is gentle on his sensitive skin! Best of all, it scored LOW on the thinkdirty app!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: 100% Safe!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to pop in and say that this is one of the only sunscreens made for babies that are 100% safe ingredients. There is an app called "Think Dirty" and it will rate products for how toxic they are depending on their ingredients, with 0 being no toxic ingredients and 10 being very toxic. This sunscreen gets a 0! If this is important to you as it was for me, then I'm glad to have given this product a review to help you find a safe product for your baby. Remember though that no baby under 6 months should have sunscreen applied, unless your pediatrician gives you the ok!

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY: Apply liberally before sun exposure. Reapply at least every two hours or after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating.
